ValidationRule.description: The milestone amount cannot be edited after it's synched to NetSuite
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISCHANGED(pse__Milestone_Amount__c), NOT(ISPICKVAL(Invoice_Status__c,"Not-Synced")), NOT($Profile.Id="00e30000000bvR3"), NOT($Profile.Id="00e50000001BmUZ"), NOT($User.Id="00550000001OhNY"), NOT($User.Id="00550000004DYYT"), NOT($User.Id="00550000004PdIQ") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This milestone has already been synched to NetSuite. Please contact your system administrator to make changes to the amount.
